name: sahib-claude-marketplace
description: Claude Code plugins for DAPR microservices, Dataverse integration, and enterprise development

plugins.name: dapr
plugins.description: Comprehensive DAPR development plugin for Python microservices with multi-cloud support (Azure, AWS, GCP). Covers all 12 DAPR building blocks plus DAPR Agents AI framework.

plugins.name: dataverse
plugins.description: Microsoft Dataverse integration - CRUD operations, OData/SQL queries, metadata management, and app development assistance for Python, Power Platform, and web applications
